means: 孟加拉国人，孟加拉国居民
（有关）孟加拉国的，（有关）孟加拉人的

sentence.Network_en: Cambodian textile exports have been hit harder than Bangladeshi ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 在纺织品出口上柬埔寨受到的冲击比孟加拉严重.

sentence.Network_en: A Bangladeshi woman gathers flower garlands on a roadside stall in Dhaka.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位孟加拉妇女在达卡将编制的花环摆在路边小摊上.

sentence.Network_en: Aid workers hope the Rohingyas will eventually be granted Bangladeshi citizenship.
sentence.Network_cn: 援助工作者希望罗辛亚族人最终能获得孟加拉公民身份.

list.abs: asa almost twice as efficient as its bangladeshi peers ., 安善的效率几乎是其孟加拉同行的两倍.
a bangladeshi family wades through flood water to refuge in harinagar , satkhira一个孟加拉人家庭趟着洪水前往萨德基拉霍里诺戈尔避难所。

entry.tran: 孟加拉国的；孟加拉国人（或文化）的
entry.def: Bangladeshi means belonging to or relating to Bangladesh, or to its people or culture.
The Bangladeshis are the people who come from Bangladesh.

example.ex: Many Bangladeshis were employed in the construction or fishing industries.
example.tran: 许多孟加拉国人都从事建筑业或渔业。

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Bangladesh
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Bangladesh or its people or language;
